verse: अस्य जगतो जन्म स्थिति भंगं यतः सर्वज्ञात् सर्वशत्के कारणभ्दवति तद् ब्रह्म॥ (शांकरभाष्य)

terms.अस्य: of this, referring to the world जगतो - of the universe जन्म - creation स्थिति - sustenance भंगं - destruction यतः - from which सर्वज्ञात् - all-knowing सर्वशत्के - in all objects कारणभ्दवति - sustainer of all causes तद् - that ब्रह्म - Brahman
terms.Meaning: Brahman is that from which the: knowing and the sustainer of all causes in all objects of the universe.
